explains: adj. 卓越的；超常的；出类拔萃的

sentences.en: There's no transcendent cosmic order or power.
sentences.cn: 没有超宇宙的秩序或力量的存在。

sentences.en: It's a transcendent moment for me - a rebirth I always seem to need.
sentences.cn: 这一刻对我来说是至高无上的—仿佛我总需要一个轮回。

sentences.en: Sula said he was sorry we hadn't been able to find something more transcendent.
sentences.cn: 苏拉说他很遗憾我们没能找到更多、更特别的东西。
